name: Count of Żubrówka
preparation:
What do you get when you combine ZU Bison Grass Vodka, Amaro Montenegro and hard apple cider? This regal cocktail, thought up by respected Denver bartender Sean Kenyon. It's piquant and coolingboth qualities of a great summer drink. Plus, when you drink it, you'll feel like nobility.

Add all ingredients (except the cider) to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Top with Ace Hard Apple Cider and garnish with an apple fan. .
